Welcome LET Members,

To celebrate the opening of our new Los Angeles location at QuadraNet, Onra Host is having a incredible special on our Xen lineup of VPS’s. We are also throwing out some deals on our Pure SSD KVM lineup ;)

**In addition we are now accepting BitPay as a payment option for all customers!!**

• **100% Onra Host Owned Hardware and Completely Debt Free**.                                                                                       -  We do NOT rent/lease from anybody!!!

• 24x7x365 Technical Support

Onra Host provides you with real 24x7x365 technical support by Live Chat, IM Chat, Ticket Support, and Email Support.
